name: StatetheState
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: state the state
des:
Traverse the "lower 48" by driving from state to state in this simple and easy-to-play game. Conserve fuel and don't waste your paycheck as you complete assigned trips from coast to coast that change every hour!

Think you know how to get from Maine to Oregon?
State the State is free to enable and play forever. Enjoy!

State to State can be played by kids of all ages but is particularly directed towards kids under 13.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
